ja: サイズミック・スラム
イミールのチャンピオン

en: Augmented skill gains increased Damage and reduced Mana Cost.
Augmented skill gains increased Cold Damage and deals AOE Damage.
Augmented skill gains increased Damage and increased Size.
Increases your Attack Damage and Attack Rating when using Weapons and no Shield.
Charge towards faced direction dealing Damage and Stunning enemies on impact.
When hitting enemies with Charge release a pulse dealing additional Damage and decreasing enemy Attack Rating.
Increases your Attack Damage and Attack Rating when using a Shield.
Passively increases all of your Resistances.
Powerful warcry which buffs you and your party members Defense Rating.
Powerful warcry which deals Damage and Stuns enemies around you.
Powerful warcry which buffs you and your party members Life and Mana values.
Smash enemies in front of you dealing Damage and knocking them up.
Passively increases your Chance of Critical Strike and the Damage from Critical Strike attacks.
Strike three fast and powerful attacks.
Pick up and throw a monster which deals AOE Damage and Stuns other enemies when landing.
Strike an attack enhanced with ice dealing Damage and Freezing enemies struck.
Spin your weapons around you dealing AOE Damage to enemies struck.
Smash the ground in front of you releasing a shockwave dealing Damage and Stunning enemies struck.
Every successful hit increases your Attack Speed and Movement Speed stacking up to 8 times.
Whirlwind now unleashes tornados dealing Damage to enemies struck.
Augmented skill increases the Size of blazes and Slows enemies on impact.
Augmented skill enhances Hydras to fire Meteors with increased Attack Speed.
Augmented skill summons two Comets instead of one with increased Damage.
Leave behind a trail of fire dealing Damage to enemies.
Enchant your attacks with additive Fire Damage.
Charge forward through the air dealing massive AOE Damage when landing.
Strike a fire enchanted Cleave Attack dealing extra Fire Damage and setting enemies struck on Fire.
All fire enchanted attacks add a stack of ignite on the enemy combusting the enemy at 10 stacks dealing AOE Fire Damage.
Cast a shield of fire to increase your Damage Reduction and Burning enemies around you.
Unleash a powerful chain attack on the nearest enemy dealing Damage and Stunning enemies struck.
Passively increases your Fire Skill Damage.
Turns you into an avatar of fire; Increasing your Attack Speed, Fire Resistance and Attack Rating.
Cast a Fireball dealing Fire Damage to enemies.
Breathe burning flames igniting enemies struck on Fire.
Cast a powerful meteor forwards dealing AOE Damage on impact.
Scorch enemies around you when active.
Spawn a fiery Hydra that shoots fireballs towards the closest enemy.
Call down a huge Comet exploding on impact dealing AOE Damage.
Cast a nova of Fire dealing Damage to enemies around you.
Spawn a molten Volcano shooting out burning rocks that deal Damage around the volcano on impact.
Call down a rain of meteors from the sky dealing AOE Damage to enemies struck.

ja: アロー・ラムページ（暴れ矢）

en: Augmented skill now causes Multishot projectiles to explode on contact dealing increased Damage.
Augmented skill causes Arrow Rain to pour down in a line towards target location dealing increased Damage.
Augmented skill causes Landmines to scatter Cluster Bombs with increased Damage when triggered.
With great accuracy shoot an arrow that bounces from enemy to enemy dealing less Damage with every bounce.
Vault in the direction aimed unleashing arrows towards nearby enemies.
Shoot multiple Arrows. Each point adds an additional arrow. The base Damage is split between the arrows (not including skill Damage increase).
Unleash a swarm of arrows towards the direction aimed.
Unleash a rain of arrows from the sky!
Launch a homing missile which seeks down its target dealing AOE Damage.
Temporarily increases your Movement Speed and Attack Speed.
Increases your Attack Rating reducing your chance to miss enemies with attacks.
Shoot a massive arrow dealing AOE Damage and Breaking enemy Physical Armor.
Throw a cluster bomb that scatters around its impact area dealing AOE Damage.
Build an arrow turret that shoots arrows at the closest enemy.
Lay down a Landmine that explodes and Stuns enemies that trigger it.
Build a Beacon that increases nearby allies Life and Mana Replenish.
Temporarily increase the Attack Speed and Damage of all your existing turrets and drones!
Increase Damage and Attack Speed of all Turrets.
Build a Cannon Turret that launches cannonballs towards the nearest enemy dealing AOE Damage.
Build a Rocket Turret that shoots rockets towards the nearest enemy dealing AOE Damage.
Build a Gunner Drone which follows you and shoots Bullets towards the nearest enemy that bounces from enemy to enemy.

ja: ラピッド・ファイア（速射）
冷凍チェーンショット

en: Spawn a barrel of explosives which detonates after some time or when shot with a projectile.
Quick draw your musket and release a short ranged buckshot.
Launch a rain of bombs on the target location.
Shoot a big cannonball that pierces enemies.
Launch your self in air traveling a short distance dealing Damage to enemies around you.
Throw a keg of gunpowder causing a chain explosion.
Shoot an explosive bullet that explodes in contact dealing AOE Damage.
Passively Increases your Attack Rating and Chance for Critical Strike.
Increase your Attack Speed and Attack Rating for a short period of time.
Shoot a piercing chainshot that Freezes and deals Damage to enemies struck.
Summon a pool of corrupted water on target location bursting into a massive torrent that Knocks Up enemies struck dealing Cold Damage.
Increases your Cold Skill Damage and Mana Replenish for a short time.
Summon a parrot to peck your enemies.
Unleash a massive anchor swinging around you dealing Damage and Freezing enemies it hits.
Passively increases your parrots Damage and Attack Speed.
Using specially hand crafted frozen lead add Cold Damage to your attacks.
Search for treasure from the corpses of dead enemies with additional Magic Find.
Call for the main ship to bombard target location dealing massive AOE Damage.
Perform a sand enhanced attack with increased Damage and Attack Rating.
Unleash a cloud of sand that travels forwards, by casting the skill again Nomad will re-locate on the sand clouds position.
Unleash a gush of sand dealing Damage and Slowing enemies around you.
Each successful attack stacks sand on the enemy eventually bursting into an AOE Sand Blast dealing Damage to all nearby enemies.
When active, increases your and your party members Attack Rating.
Strike enemies in front of you with Sand Tremors dealing Damage.
Your attacks Leech Mana from enemies.
Unleash sand at enemies when struck dealing Damage and Stunning them.
Summon a massive vortex of quick sand that pulls enemies inside dealing Damage and Slowing them.
Perform an AOE attack with increased Chance for Critical Strike and Attack Rating.
Charge in target direction and unleash a powerful AOE swipe.
Perform a light enchanted attack bringing rays of sun down to nearby enemies.
Throw a huge piercing scimitar dealing Damage to enemies in its path which returns back to the player after a short delay.
Perform a rupturing attack causing your enemies to Bleed for a portion of your Attack Damage.
Perform an enhanced attack that causes a sharp blade to chain between enemies nearby dealing Physical Damage.
Spawn a ghostly blade that attacks nearby enemies.
Lowers the Physical Resistance of all Bleeding targets.
Throw a bottle of moonshine setting the impacted area on Fire.
Throw three handcrafted pipe bombs dealing AOE Damage.
Spill Oil on the ground Slowing and lowering enemy Attack Rating. Oil also ignites into flames when coming in contact with Fire.
Throw a truck tire that deals damage to enemies and leaves oil behind if Oil Spill is skilled.
When igniting Oil in flames, also make the enemies combust dealing AOE Damage around them.
Increases your Attack Damage and Fire Skill damage for a short period.
Increases your Attack Rating and Movement Speed.
Passively increases your Fire Skill Damage.
Call your hillbilly friends to siege your opponents in a pickup truck. Leaves oil behind if Oil Spill is skilled.
Perform a powerful AOE slash with increased Damage and Attack Rating.
Spin your chainsaw with force loosing control over time and dealing Damage to enemies around you.
Increases your Damage and Attack Rating when using a chainsaw.
Increases your Attack Rating and Attack Speed for a short period.
Increases your Chance for Critical Strike and Critical Strike Damage.
Increases your Life and Life Replenish.
Throw a chainsaw on the ground spinning and dealing Damage to enemies it hits.
Summon a massive tree and cut it down on nearby enemies dealing Damage and Stunning them.
Unleash Bone Fragments dealing Damage to enemies. Additional points increase the amount of Fragments.
Cast a Meat Shield decreasing Damage Taken.
Throw a huge lump of Meat that explodes on impact dealing Damage and leaving corpses on the ground.
Unleash a rotten breath of toxins Poisoning all enemies that it touches.
Launch a Bone Spear dealing Damage to enemies on its path.
Corrupt the ground at the target area, reducing any enemies Poison Resist that enters it.
Spawn a Bone Spirit which travels into the nearest enemy and explodes on impact dealing AOE Damage.
Unleash a toxic Poison Nova Poisoning all enemies on its path.
Explode the target corpse dealing heavy AOE Damage.
Raise a Skeleton Warrior from target corpse to fight on your side.
Increases the Life, Damage and Attack Rating of all your Skeletons.
Unleash a curse on the target area which decreases enemy Defense and Damage dealt.
Raise a Skeleton Mage from target corpse to fight on your side.
Unleash a curse on the target area which increases any attackers Life Steal.
Enrage your summons increasing their Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short period.
Summon a Damned Legion to fight on your side.
Increases the Resistances of all your summons.
Summon a Vengeful Spirit to fight on your side.
Perform a short but fast dash to target location dealing Damage to nearby enemies.
Perform an AOE attack with increased Attack Rating and Damage.
Gain a chance to evade Melee and Ranged attacks.
Explode a smoke bomb Slowing, dealing Damage and lowering enemy Attack Rating.
Throw piercing shurikens in target direction dealing Physical Damage.
Gain increased Attack Damage for every 10% of missing Life.
Throw an explosive Kunai dealing AOE Damage and Stunning enemies on impact.
Increases your Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short period.
Spray knives around you dealing Damage to nearby enemies.
Cast a barrier of rotating blades around you dealing Damage to enemies that come in contact.
Strike multiple enemies while being untargetable.
Throw piercing bolas Slowing enemies and dealing AOE Damage when exploding.
Increases your Attack Damage and Movement Speed for a short period.
Step into the shadows re-appearing at target location dealing AOE Damage to all nearby enemies.
Gain increased Movement Speed for a short period after killing an enemy.
Perform a huge AOE attack blinking a short distance and dealing Damage to enemies in its path.
Strike enemies with a lightning shock dealing increased Damage and additive Lightning Damage.
Cast a shield of thunder shocking enemies attacking you with Lightning Damage.
Strike enemies with a furious attack releasing a Chain Lightning.
When active shock enemies around you with Lightning Damage.
Perform a thunder enhanced AOE attack shocking enemies around you with Lightning Damage.
When active, increases your and your party members Attack Speed.
Turn into a ball of lightning traveling through the air to target location dealing AOE Damage to nearby enemies when landing.
Increases your Attack Speed and all Attack and Skill Damage dealt for a short period.
Cast a bolt of holy light dealing Magic Damage to enemies.
When active, increases your and your party members Attack Damage and Skill Damage dealt.
Summon a Holy Hammer that orbits around you dealing Magic Damage to enemies in its path.
Gain Mana after killing an enemy.
Call down a fist of divine energy exploding into multiple Holy Bolts dealing Magic Damage.
Cast a nova of holy light dealing Magic Damage to enemies and Healing allies.
Increases your Casting Rate and Mana Replenish for a short period.
Strike enemies with increased Damage and Poisoning them for a portion of the damage.
Perform a piercing attack piercing enemies and dealing increased Damage and Poisoning them for a portion of the damage.
Jump towards target location dealing Damage and Knocking Up enemies around you when landing.
Call down a rain of falling spears on target location dealing Damage to enemies within the area.
Killing an enemy causes them to explode into toxic gas Poisoning enemies it touches.
Gain increased Poison Skill Damage for a short period.
Unleash toxic fissures on all enemies around you dealing Damage and Poisoning them.
Perform a lightning enhanced attack with increased Damage and additive Lightning Damage.
Increases your chance to Dodge attacks.
Your attacks rebound into the closest enemy of your target with increased Lightning Damage.
Furiously throw lightning enchanted spears towards target location.
Dash towards target location striking nearby enemies with Chain Lightning.
Replenish a portion of your Life and Mana after killing an enemy.
Perform an attack that spreads Lightning into all enemies nearby the target.
Gain increased Lightning Skill Damage and Attack Speed for a short period.
Rapidly fire your weapon multiple times with increased Attack Damage and Additive Fire Damage.
Increases your Attack Damage and Critical Strike Damage when using Ranged Weapons.
Deal extra Attack Damage to enemies below 30% Life.
Fire a barrage of bullets towards target direction dealing Damage.
Throw a Shredder on the ground spinning with deadly speed dealing Damage and Slowing enemies it comes in contact with.
Fire a satanic bullet possessed by darkness which explodes into multiple bullets on impact.
Increase your Attack Speed and all Damage dealt for a short period.
When active, increases your and your party members Attack Rating.
Harness the power of your inner demon and fire multiple massive bullets in a line dealing heavy Damage.
Perform a series of dashing attacks dealing Damage and finally Stunning enemies around you on the final attack.
Become airborne and smash the ground dealing AOE Damage and stunning enemies around you.
Increases your Critical Strike Damage and Chance for Critical Strikes.
Demon's Calling now spawns 5 Shadow Anomalies that perform Demon's Calling with increased Damage when re-casted.
Leech Life out of enemies in target location dealing Damage and Healing you.
Increases your Life Steal and Attack Rating when using Swords.
Perform an attack that releases a wave of shadow dealing increased Damage.
Turn into a demon gaining increased Attack Damage and Attack Speed for a short period.

ja: ガット・スプレッド（散らした内臓）
ブラッド・サージ（血の波動）
デーモニック・プレゼンス（悪魔参列）
ブラッド・デーモンズ（血の悪魔）

en: Cast fragments of bone towards target location dealing Magic Damage.
Smash the ground pushing spikes out dealing Magic Damage and Knocking enemies into air.
Summon a storm of bone and cartilage that orbit around you dealing Magic Damage to enemies. Additional points add additional bones and cartilage.
Enemies that have no other enemies around them take increased Magic Damage.
When damaged by cartilage and bone enemies are stacked up and at 10 stacks they explode spreading bone and cartilage around them.
When active, increases your and your party members Magic Skill Damage.
Rip the spine out of your enemies dealing Magic Damage.
Unleash a barrage of bones in target direction dealing Magic Damage.
Every 10th cast causes your intestines to boil and burst lumps of blood around you.
Release a bunch of bloody projectiles towards target location dealing Magic Damage.
When active, increases your and your party members Mana Replenish.
Channel a massive surge of blood towards target direction dealing heavy Damage and Slowing enemies on its path.
When Active take a portion of incoming Damage as Mana.
Instantly Replenish a portion of your Mana.
Every time you cast a spell summon a blood demon towards the closest enemy.
Blood Surge now causes its target to release Blood Tendrils with increased Magic Damage.
Unleash a massive boulder traveling in target location dealing Magic Damage to enemies on its path.
Summon small twisters towards target location dealing Magic Damage.
Unleash rock fragments towards target location dealing Magic Damage.
Raise vines from the ground dealing Magic Damage over time and Rooting enemies in place.
Summon a tornado traveling towards target direction dealing Magic Damage and Slowing enemies on impact.
Call down a meteor storm on target location dealing Magic Damage.
Smash the ground causing cracks that release fissures dealing Magic Damage.
Summon a totem that fires flying rock fragments that explode on landing dealing Magic Damage.
Increases your Mana and Mana Replenish.
Summon a totem that releases Chain Lightning on nearby enemies dealing Lightning Damage.
Spawn a Spirit Wolf to fight on your side.
Increases Spirit Wolves Damage and Life.
Spawn a totem that casts piercing Fire Projectiles dealing Fire Damage.
Increases your Movement Speed and Skill Damage.
Increases your Mana and the Attack Range of all totems.
Summon a totem that rapidly shoots Piercing Chaos Bolts dealing Magic Damage.
Mark the enemies on target area for Satan causing them to pulse unholy energy when being struck with Magic Damage.
Unleash Restless Spirits from an unholy dimension to seek new hosts inflicting Magic Damage to the target. Additional points increase the amount of spirits.
By sacrificing your victims to the Devil gain increased Mana Replenish after each kill.
Gather your inner darkness and unleash a powerful Piercing Shadow Bolt inflicting Magic Damage to enemies on its path.
Rip the souls from nearest enemies dealing Magic Damage Replenishing your Life and Mana.
Sacrifice your own blood when taking Damage from any source increasing your Life and Mana Replenish for a short period.
Unleash a wave of unholy energy around you inflicting Magic Damage to nearby enemies.
Your unholy essence drives birds into insanity sending Crows towards random nearby enemies combusting into Magic Damage on impact.
Summon all the coven's cultists to march in the name of Satan inflicting heavy Magic Damage to enemies on their path.
Light target location into holy flames dealing Magic Damage.
Cast divine light in target direction dealing Magic Damage.
Heal your self and any nearby ally.
Healing your self smites enemies around you with holy light.
Using Flash Heal increases Life Replenish for a short period.
Cast a holy light jumping from enemy to enemy dealing Magic Damage.
By the power of God bless your self and any nearby allies with immortality for a short period.
Bless the target area with divine energy Healing players and dealing Magic Damage to enemies.
Summon a pulsating orb of mana that Replenishes Mana for players and deals Magic Damage to enemies.
Flail a big chained Spike Ball dealing Damage to enemies on its path.
Throw a Grenade that bounces and explodes on impact dealing AOE Damage.
All bombs scatter small bombs around when exploding.
Throw a huge bomb scattering into shrapnell on impact dealing heavy AOE damage.
Increases the Damage and Size of Heavy Ball.
Throw a massive spike ball into target location dealing AOE Damage and dragging your self towards it through the air.
Increase Attack Speed and Attack Damage when using Mace weapons.
Rapidly throw a barrage of small bombs in target direction dealing AOE Damage.
Gain increased Attack Damage, Attack Rating and Attack Speed for a short period.
Perform an AOE attack with increased Attack Rating and Damage attaching Chains to the enemy.
Throw a retiarius net into the target location dealing Damage and Rooting enemies on the area.
Throw a Chain Trap into the target location dealing Damage and Hooking nearby enemies.
Enemies affected by Chains Explode upon death.
Increases the Damage and amount of enemies hooked by Chain Trap.
Perform an AOE attack that causes the target to Bleed.
Hook all enemies towards you and drop a huge bomb from the sky into your position.
Violently rip all Chains out of enemies dealing heavy AOE Damage.
Throw a surgical knife with razor sharp accuracy that bounces from enemy to enemy dealing Physical Damage.
Increases the force of Surgical Blood Letting causing targets to Bleed.
Gain increased Life Steal from Bleeding targets.
Empower your attack with a mixture of chemicals causing the enemy to release a toxic cloud that lowers enemy Attack Rating and deals Magic Damage.
Inject your self with a mRNA gene altering shot increasing your Skill Damage and Movement Speed for a short period.
When active, increases your and your party members Life and Life Replenish.
Gain increased Attack Damage based on your Life.
Gain increased Attack Speed and Life Steal for a short period. When Active lose a portion of your maximum Life per second (Non-Fatal).
Send plague rats in target direction dealing Poison Damage on impact.
Throw a toxic flask in target location dealing Poison Damage.
Unleash a breath of toxic flames towards target location dealing Poison Damage.
Toxic Flask also leaves a pool of poisonous substance on the ground dealing Poison Damage, Plaguing and Slowing enemies.
Causes Plagued targets to take increased Poison Damage.
Plague Rats explode on impact causing heavy AOE Poison Damage.
Throw a glass jar into target location releasing leeches dealing Poison Damage and infecting them with the Plague on impact.
Cause all Plagued targets on target location to spread the Plague and Damage enemies around them.
Summon Randy the Rancid Rat dealing Poison Damage and inflicting Plague when attacking enemies.
Perform a powerful attack with increased Damage and Attack Rating.
Place a commending banner on the target location increasing nearby players Attack Speed and Attack Rating.
Charge towards target location Stunning and dealing Damage to enemies on impact.

Perform a long ranged lance attack that Pierces enemies in a line dealing Physical Damage. If the lance comes in contact with a Commending Banner you get dragged to the banner Stunning enemies around you.
Gives you a Chance to Parry incoming attacks.
Battle Charge breaks enemy Defense and lowers their Attack Rating.
Call a crushing lance down from the sky smashing the target location dealing AOE Damage and Stunning enemies.
When Casting also throw a Lance at the closest enemy.
Gain increased Attack Damage and Skill Damage for a short period.
Perform an attack with your Shield dealing Damage according to your shield's Defense Rating.
Taunt enemies to attack you. Additional points increase the duration and enemy amount.
When Active all enemy attacks get countered with thrusting lances for a short period.
Increases your Life and All Resistances.
Every time you get hit by an enemy attack gain Stacks. At maximum Stacks unleash a huge AOE pulse dealing Damage to enemies around you. Can also be casted to consume the Stacks.
Cast a wall of shields around you blocking enemy projectiles.
Shield Wall is enhanced with spikes dealing Damage to enemies on impact.
Replenish full Life and gain increased Skill Damage and Damage Reduction for short period.
Summon a Sand Guardian that attacks nearby enemies dealing Magic Damage.
Send a cloud of sand towards target location dealing Magic Damage on impact and forcing all Sand Guardians to charge towards the area.
Summon a circle of Sand Guardians around you increasing Sand Guardian Damage.
Sand Guardians Break enemy Magic Resistance on attack.
Pull your self into the closest Sand Guardian in the target location empowering all nearby Sand Guardians Damage for a short period.
Sand Guardians explode upon expiration dealing AOE Magic Damage.
Link of Sand now increases your Magic Skill Damage and Damage Reduction for a short period.
Order Sand Guardians to deal a deadly attack with increased Magic Damage and Stunning their target.
Order Sand Guardians to perform a deadly AOE attack dealing heavy Damage.
Channel waves of fractal energy on the target enemy sending pulses out Slowing and dealing Magic Damage to nearby enemies.
Raise enemies in target location into the air smashing them down with quantum force dealing Magic Damage.
Detach from your quantum self leaving your fractal self behind that Taunts nearby enemies and explodes after a short period.
Increase Magic Skill Damage and Cast Rate for a short period.
Break time and space causing all nearby enemies to be Slowed and take Magic Damage.
Warp a short distance towards target location gaining Movement Speed for a short period.
Summon a fractal Viking, Pyromancer and Marksman to fight on your side.
Throw a huge Frozen Boulder dealing Cold Damage to enemies on its path.
Breathe freezing air into target location Freezing and dealing Cold Damage to enemies.
Gain additional Cold Skill Damage for every 100 points of Mana.
Cast a frozen orb traveling in target direction releasing Icicles Freezing and dealing Cold Damage to enemies on its path.
Cast a frost enhanced shield on your self reducing incoming Damage, Freezing and dealing Cold Damage to enemies that attack you.
Every time you cast a spell also release an Icicle dealing Cold Damage.
Teleport a short distance releasing a Frost Nova on target location.
Cast a freezing Blizzard into the target location dealing Cold Damage and Freezing enemies.
Every 7th attack unleashes an AOE blast dealing Cold Damage.
Perform an attack enhanced with ice dealing additional Cold Damage.
Leap through the air into target location Freezing and dealing Cold Damage to enemies when landing.
Flash Freeze and Sweep Freeze deal additional Cold Damage and stacks Permafrost on enemies eventually Deep Freezing them.
Perform an AOE attack dealing Cold Damage.
Release a bellowing shout dealing Cold Damage based on your Maximum Life to all enemies around you.
Break enemy Cold Resistance on attack.
Summon the power of Aurgelmir and turn into a war machine of the frozen tundra increasing your Cold Skill Damage, Attack Speed and Life Replenish for a short period.
The Mercenary charges into the closest enemy stunning and damaging all enemies around.
Increases the Mercenarys critical attack damage.
Increases damage return from enemy attacks.
Each attack on an enemy generates a stack of rage. When fully stacked the Mercenary releases a powerful AOE attack that deals damage and breaks enemy armor.
Increases damage done by melee attacks.
Increases damage reduction from all sources.
Incoming attacks generated stacks of pain. Once fully stacked, release a powerful AOE pulse that damages, knocks back and slows enemies.
Increases life per hit from melee attacks.
Increases the value of Mercenarys aura.
Increases health regeneration the less health the Mercenary has.
The Mercenary unleashes a powerful long ranged attack.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to deal additional damage, knock back enemies and slow them.
Enemies have a chance to get stunned when attacking the Mercenary.
The Mercenary detects enemies who attack the player, charging into them and taunting all enemies nearby.
The Mercenary shoots a powerful piercing shot that stuns enemies on impact.
Increases the Mercenarys Critical Attack Damage and Critical Rate.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to shoot multiple projectiles with increased damage.
The Mercenary launches a barrage of Heat Seeking Missiles.
Each attack on an enemy stacks up. When fully stacked the Mercenary shoots a projectile that explodes on collision.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to shoot a piercing projectile with increased damage.
Increases the Mercenarys and Players life per hit.
Increases the value of Mercenarys aura.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to break enemy resistances.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to perform a burstshot.
The Mercenary drops a huge bomb into the nearest enemy which scatters arrows around when hitting the ground.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to deal AOE damage and confuse all enemies impacted.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to give the Player and Mercenary an Attack Speed boost.
The Mercenary throws a trap that hooks nearby enemies in damaging and stunning them.
The Mercenary blasts the nearest enemy with a powerful Arcane Blast.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to scorch the ground beneath the target.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to regenerate mana for the Player.
The Mercenary casts a chain of Arcane that bounces from enemy to enemy dealing damage and lowering their magic resistance.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to buff Player and Mercenary Ability Power.
Taking damage stacks up. Once fully stacked the Mercenary casts a Cosmic Bolt towards the nearest enemy.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to cast an Arcane Meteor down from the sky damaging enemies it impacts.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to burn and slow enemies.
Increases the value of Mercenarys aura.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to unleash an Arcane Nova dealing damage to enemies.
The Mercenary creates an Arcane Link between the Mercenary and the Player dealing damage to enemies it collides with.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to unleash a barrage of arcane bolts.
The Mercenary has a chance on attack to shield the player for a portion of maximum health.
The Mercenary blasts all nearby enemies with arcane explosions dealing damage and slowing them.
